name: Hell Diver Post-Compo
description:
Hell Diver balanced after a few replays for more enjoyment.

For the original entry for the Jam please redirect to:

https://macdoom.itch.io/hell-diver-web-laptoppc

HELL DIVER!!

You're a helpless damned soul falling directly into the jaws of HELL. Will you surpass the earth's bowls or you blood will feed the underground's intestines forever?

Whoever reaches what's beyond human comprehension wil shall be rewarded with enormous satisfaction and a happy face

Just a few fixes and touches to the hitboxes and syncing the music properly to the stage changes.

Those Angels are good, go to them. They really wanna help you

Changes from jam entry:

- Centered score and health  for mobile users can play with bigger resolution.
- Fixed some hitboxes
- Synced music to final stages
- Cuter angels
- Obstacle delay
